data.description:
The Dream Dimension is an immersive exploration game where you enter various dream worlds and collect dream shards. Collecting dream shards will open up new worlds to explore. There are 16 unique dream worlds and 50 dream shards. Discover magical ruins, alien structures, fantasy villages, giant mushrooms, underwater treasure, and much more! The Dream Dimension is not about the destination but the journey. Take your time and enjoy the environments.

The Dream Dimension supports all input devices. Free movement is the main method of traveling, but if you are more prone to motion sickness there is teleport movement as well.

changelog.change_log: -Can now rotate with motion controller by pressing on sides.

-Option for tap to move instead of swipe
-Option to hide motion controller
-Added chairs to night village dream
-Added ambient sounds to some dreams
-Bug fixes

-4 new dream worlds
-expanded and improved existing dream worlds -new hub world design
-performance improvements -removed the ability to pick up objects
-many bug fixes
-new graphics options in the main menu as well as ability to delete data

-Added new motion controller support
-Single Pass rendering enabled for devices that support it
-Requires OpenGLES3
-Performance improvements
-Lighting improvements
-Can now move to SD card
-Removed AA toggle (2x always on)
-Fixed movement issues
-Added reticle in main menu
-Removed water in hub world
-Spec maps added in town dream
-Changed texture compression to ASTC
-Bug Fixes

New space dream world
Bug fixes

New alien planet dream world

New spooky dream world to celebrate Halloween!

Changed textures for the castle in the snow dream world
Possible fix for users experiencing crash on startup

Added the option to toggle auto speed up
Bug fixes

Lowered footstep volume

Changed how swipes are handled to hopefully fix touchpad issues

Added snap rotation for gamepads
Improved touchpad swipe responsiveness
Bug fixes

Bug fixes
World optimizations
Lightmap improvements
Various additions
You can now walk on the water in the magic island dream
Changed robot dream for performance reasons

When you walk for 5 seconds, you now start to run
Performance improvements
Minor bug fixes

⦁	Added two checks to make sure app closes properly ⦁ Major build size reduction

⦁	Improved movement no longer causes jitter on collisions
